There is no warranty for this software, to the extent permitted by applicable law. The copyright holders provide the program "as is", without any guarantee, neither expressly nor implicitly, including - but not limited to - the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. The entire risk as to the quality and performance of the program is with you. Should the program prove defective, you assume the cost of all necessary servicing, repair or correction. In no event unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing will any copyright holder, or any other party who modifies and/or conveys the program, be liable to you for damages.\n\nPlease make sure to inform your customers about the digital processing of personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (EU GDPR).
With this function you can inform a person about the data saved about him (required by section 15 EU-GDPR - General Data Protection Regulation).\n\nPlease select a method, how to export the data.
eMail Template (CUSTOMER will be replaced with the customer name)
Information about your data saved in our database

We would like to inform you about your personal data saved in our database. You can find your exported record as CSV file attachment in this e-mail. CSV files can be opened with any standard spreadsheet software (for example LibreOffice Calc).
Processing purpose:
Categories of personal data:
Receiver of personal data:
Planned duration of storage:
Source of the data:
You have at any time the right of correction and deletion of your data. You can declare this intention for example in an answer to this e-mail.
With this function, you can import customers or export all records into a single file.
CSV files can be opened with any standard spreadsheet software (for example LibreOffice Calc). VCF files can be opened with email programs like Thunderbird.
"If you want to unsubscribe from this newsletter, please send a reply with 'unsubscribe' as subject."
"There are no customers in your database, which have a valid email address and accepted newsletters. Therefore, you can't compose a new newsletter."
Printing is not supported on your Android version.
Please set up sync in settings.
The file does not contain any valid records.
Please connect your device with a network to use the sync feature.

Please note the following important information for the CSV import.

The first line is interpreted as column title. Your CSV file should contain the following columns: id, title, first_name, last_name, phone_home, phone_mobile, phone_work, email, street, zipcode, city, country, customer_group, newsletter, birthday, last_modified, notes

Other columns are imported as custom fields.

Important: Please use a comma (,) as field separator. The customer ID is generated when the field is empty or the ID already exists. The field "newsletter" may only contain 0 or 1. The date format must be "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS".

You can edit your CSV file for example with a software like LibreOffice Calc before you start the import.
Do you like this app? Please submit a review.
Rate now at the Play Store…

Free only for private use, non-profit organisations and educational or testing purposes. Please contact me via email if you are not sure, whether your application needs commercial licensing. One time purchase.
This icon indicates, if the feature is unlocked.
Optional activatable mode that allows only data entry. For example, the device can be handed to showroom visitors. Furthermore you can lock the app completely. One time purchase.
Unlocks the dark mode and allows you to set your own title bar color and startup logo in the settings. One time purchase.
You can continue this purchase at any time.
Please check your internet connection and try again.
Could not fetch current prices for in-app purchases.
Please enter the correct password to unlock the app.
You can unlock this feature with an in-app purchase.
You can unlock more than 500 customer records with an in-app purchase.
Allows you to add any number of custom fields to customer records. You can also add drop down lists and sort the customer list by your custom fields. One time purchase.
Please select at least one item.
Use group (only customers who agreed the newsletter)
Please backup your data regularly (see \'Information\' for details).
Create more than 500 customer records. One time purchase.

This app uses the opencsv library (Copyright 2019 opencsv Contributors, Apache License 2.0) and the ZXing barcode library (Copyright 2019 ZXing Contributors, Apache License 2.0, https://github.com/zxing/zxing).
Sync data with your iOS device!
Please note that only english and german messages can be considered.
Please make sure that all devices are synchronized in order to not issue duplicate voucher numbers.
This app is Open Source. If you want to improve the app or its translations, please check out the repository on Github.
Subscribe to the cloud sync service to backup your customer data in the cloud and sync it over multiple devices. A monthly payment is necessary because the database server incurs running costs.
Do you really want to delete this voucher?
Newsletter checkbox was checked but no email address was entered. Please enter an email address or uncheck the newsletter checkbox.

In this mode, you can give the tablet to customers so that they can register themselves without being able to view or delete the other customer data.\n\nYou can use the Android feature \'Screen Pinning\' to prevent the usage of other apps and to prevent deletion of the Customer Database app. To enable, please open the Android settings - \'Security & Location\' - \'Screen Pinning\'.

The customer database server is Open Source, so you can set up an own database server. This assumes that you are familiar with the Apache Webserver, PHP and MySQL. Please visit the GitHub page for more information.
With the sync feature you can backup your customer data on a database server and sync it over multiple devices. You have the following options to use this feature.
You can use the paid customer database cloud.
2. Please subscribe to the customer database cloud access license to connect to the cloud. (A recurring payment is necessary because the database server used for this service incurs running costs.)
3. Press the sync button on the main screen regularly to upload your data in the cloud. Optionally, you can log in with the same account on other devices to sync the data to this device.
A confirmation link will be sent to your email address.
Please click on the link in the email we\'ve sent to your address to activate your account. (Please also check your spam folder.)
Remove all data from your device?

The sync account was changed.

If you choose 'Yes', all data will be removed from your device. With the next sync you can download all data from the newly entered Account from the server.

If you choose 'No', all data will remain on your device. With the next sync, the data from your device will be merged with that from the newly entered account from the server.
I accept the terms of service and privacy policy
Please accept the terms of service and privacy policy.
How does the sync function work? (FAQ)
I agree to the processing of my data until further notice
Please agree to the data processing.
Show Data Processing Consent Checkbox in Input-Only Mode
With this function, you can import vouchers or export all records into a single file.

Please note the following important information for the CSV import.

The first line is interpreted as column title. Your CSV file should contain the following columns: id, number, original_value, current_value, from_customer, for_customer, issued, valid_until, redeemed, last_modified, notes

Important: Please use a comma (,) as field separator. The customer ID is generated when the field is empty or the ID already exists. The date format must be "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS".

You can edit your CSV file for example with a software like LibreOffice Calc before you start the import.
File too big! Files can have a maximum size of 1 MB.
File limit reached! You can not add more files to one customer.
The end date is before the start date!
Appointment too short! Please create an appointment with a length of at least 5 minutes.
Attach files to customer records (maximum 20 files and 1MB per file). One time purchase.
Unlocks the calendar features. One time purchase.
No calendar selected! Please create a calendar in the settings.
CSV files can be opened with any standard spreadsheet software (for example LibreOffice Calc). ICS files can be opened with calendar programs like Thunderbird.
With this function, you can import appointments or export all records into a single file.
With this function you can export a single appointment and send it via email to your customer. Most email clients can automatically add ICS files to the receiver\'s calendar.
Please enter a new file name.
Please check your internet connection and unlock code and try again.
Invalid code - could not find any valid entries in this code.
Please grant camera permission to use this feature.
Do you want to import this customer?
Please set a password in the settings first.

"By default, the data is stored only locally on your device. Please back up your database regularly to not lose your data in case of malfunction or loss of your mobile device. This is done by simply copying the database files under /Android/data/de.georgsieber.customerdb/files to your computer or another external storage.\n\nThe backup is even easier if you use the sync feature. The data will then be synchronized with an (own) MySQL server. For more information about this backup option, please visit the settings."

The customer database cloud and self-hosted server offers a read-only CardDAV API for syncing your customers into AVM FRITZ!Box, Thunderbird (with CardBook addon), Evolution or macOS/iOS contacts app (the customers can only be read into these programs, but not edited!).

CardDAV Server:
https://customerdb.sieber.systems/carddav.php

Username:
<your customer database account email address>

Password:
<your customer database account password>

Caller ID works out-of-the-box with the Google phone app, which is preinstalled on many devices. Other phone apps (e.g. on Samsung or HTC devices) are not able to query the Customer Database. In this case, please install the Google phone app from the Google Play Store or the Customer Database Plugin App, which can display a tiny overlay with the customer name on incoming calls.
